risk_factors: Mid-cap divergence ($IWM weakness) signals narrowing leadership
Geopolitical escalation (Ukraine, Taiwan) as high-impact wildcard
Guidance cuts and earnings revisions across software/fintech signaling demand weakness
Fed communication clarityâ€”hawkish surprise could accelerate risk-off
Holiday liquidity constraints amplifying intraday volatility and profit-taking
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Immediate resistance at $700 (call wall, 146k OIâ€”active hedging likely caps upside). Support at $670 (45k OI, active). QQQ: Resistance at $625â€“$630 (both active, tight resistance zone). Support at $590 (164k OI put wall, dormant until approached). Watch for breakout above $700 SPY or rejection at $630 QQQ to signal intraday direction.

If $670 breaks, test $640 (dormant put wall). QQQ: Trading zone $620â€“$640. Breakout above $640 would target higher levels; breakdown below $620 toward $590 (put wall) signals broader weakness.
